headline: Blue Owl's Redemption Shift Shakes Private Credit Industry
summary: OWL's redemption halt at OBDC II jolted private credit, sending APO, BX, KKR and ARES down, as liquidity fears grip the $1.8T market.

headline: Apollo on Private Credit: 'We Don't Do What Banks Do'
summary: Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan and Eiji Ueda, the firm's Asia-Pacific chief, discuss how the business's private-credit expertise meshes with Japan's needs to finance capital investment. They speak with Bloomberg Television's David Westin on Wall Street Week.

headline: Apollo's Rowan Says Japan Is Poised for a Big Comeback
summary: Marc Rowan, chief executive officer of Apollo Global Management Inc., says Japan learned tough lessons during three decades of economic stagnation and is poised to come roaring back. He speaks with Bloomberg Television's David Westin on Wall Street Week.

raw.headline: Apollo's Rowan Says Japan Is Poised for a Big Comeback

headline: Rowan Sees Private Capital as Key Need for Japan
summary: Apollo Global Management Inc.'s ability to help provide private capital will fill a crucial niche as Japan seeks to nurture investment, Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan says. He speaks with Bloomberg Television's David Westin on Wall Street Week.

headline: A Blue Note on Private Credit: Heard on the Street Thursday Recap
summary: Blue Owl Capital set off a wave of selling in asset managers.  The private credit firm restricted withdrawals from a fund aimed at ordinary investors.  This added to concerns around the lack of transparency in private investments and whether they are suitable for everyday investors.

raw.headline: A Blue Note on Private Credit: Heard on the Street Thursday Recap
raw.summary: Blue Owl Capital set off a wave of selling in asset managers.  The private credit firm restricted withdrawals from a fund aimed at ordinary investors.  This added to concerns around the lack of transparency in private investments and whether they are suitable for everyday investors.

headline: Elizabeth Warren Blasts 'Shadowy' Private Credit, Urges Trump Admin To Act On Blue Owl
summary: Senator Elizabeth Warren slams Blue Owl over private credit withdrawal freezes, calling the firm "shadowy" and warning of market cockroaches.

headline: Private-Credit Warning Signs Flash After Blue Owl Unloads $1.4 Billion in Assets
summary: Wall Street has been eagerly selling private credit as a hot opportunity for individual investors.  Blue Owl Capital  a poster child for the industry, said it is liquidating $1.4 billion in assets to raise money to pay out individuals who bought into some of its funds in their heyday but now want to get out.  Stocks across the private-fund industry slid as the deal raised questions about how much fund managers can count on individuals to stay invested in hard-to-sell assets for the long term.

Stocks across the private-fund industry slid as the deal raised questions about how much fund managers can count on individuals to stay invested in hard-to-sell assets for the long term.
